name: part_006
file: tmp_【#2ETAnniv】 Zeta's Mini 3D Party!【Vestia Zeta ⧸ Hololive ID】 [YOD6oVkRp9E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Vestia Zeta performs a chibi version of 'Stay with Me' (Miki Matsubara cover).
scenes.song_name: Mayonaka no Door ~ Stay With Me

scenes.description: Vestia Zeta talks to the audience about the previous chibi performance and jokingly complains about people leaving.

subtitles.original: ...Stay with me
subtitles.english: ...Stay with me

subtitles.original: 口癖を言いながら
subtitles.english: While saying your favorite phrase

subtitles.original: 二人の時間を抱いて
subtitles.english: Holding our time together

subtitles.original: まだ忘れず 暖めてた
subtitles.english: Not yet forgotten, I was keeping it warm

subtitles.original: Stay with me
subtitles.english: Stay with me

subtitles.original: 真夜中のドアを叩き
subtitles.english: Knocking on the midnight door

subtitles.original: 帰らないでと泣いた
subtitles.english: And cried, "Don't go home"

subtitles.original: あの季節が 今 目の前
subtitles.english: That season is now before my eyes

subtitles.original: Stay with me
subtitles.english: Stay with me

subtitles.original: 口癖を言いながら
subtitles.english: While saying your favorite phrase

subtitles.original: 二人の時間を抱いて
subtitles.english: Holding our time together

subtitles.original: まだ忘れず 暖めてた
subtitles.english: Not yet forgotten, I was keeping it warm

subtitles.original: Stay with me
subtitles.english: Stay with me

subtitles.original: 真夜中のドアを叩き
subtitles.english: Knocking on the midnight door

subtitles.original: 帰らないでと泣いた
subtitles.english: And cried, "Don't go home"

subtitles.original: あの季節が 今 目の前
subtitles.english: That season is now before my eyes

subtitles.original: Stay with me
subtitles.english: Stay with me

subtitles.original: [Cries]
subtitles.english: [Cries]

subtitles.original: Did you stay during the whole concert? Did you leave?
subtitles.english: Did you stay during the whole concert? Did you leave?

subtitles.original: I saw two or three people just left.
subtitles.english: I saw two or three people just left.

subtitles.original: Even though the song was called "Stay With Me",
subtitles.english: Even though the song was called "Stay With Me",

subtitles.original: but some people still left. Why?
subtitles.english: but some people still left. Why?

subtitles.original: Heartless! Heartless!
subtitles.english: Heartless! Heartless!

subtitles.original: Human beings are so heartless.
subtitles.english: Human beings are so heartless.

subtitles.original: Ampun Gusti!
subtitles.english: Lord have mercy!

subtitles.original: You know, this song, "Stay With Me",
subtitles.english: You know, this song, "Stay With Me",

subtitles.original: I've been singing it in like unarchived karaoke,
subtitles.english: I've been singing it in like unarchived karaoke,

subtitles.original: even like I think archived karaokes back then.
subtitles.english: even like I think archived karaokes back then.

subtitles.original: I sang a lot of versions of "Stay With Me".
subtitles.english: I sang a lot of versions of "Stay With Me".

subtitles.original: So this was my... chibi performance.
subtitles.english: So this was my... chibi performance.

subtitles.original: So I hope you guys liked that one.
subtitles.english: So I hope you guys liked that one.

subtitles.original: Because the next one is even more...
subtitles.english: Because the next one is even more...

subtitles.original: Don't be scared.
subtitles.english: Don't be scared.

subtitles.original: The next one is even more sickeningly sweet.
subtitles.english: The next one is even more sickeningly sweet.

subtitles.original: But, but, I have a surprise because the next one...
subtitles.english: But, but, I have a surprise because the next one...

subtitles.original: ...just like the previous song...
subtitles.english: ...just like the previous song...

subtitles.original: I forgot to mention this because I'm dumb,
subtitles.english: I forgot to mention this because I'm dumb,

subtitles.original: but I forgot to mention that the previous song I sang was in Vestia-vision.
subtitles.english: but I forgot to mention that the previous song I sang was in Vestia-vision.

subtitles.original: This song as well, I'm gonna have Vestia to come take over my...
subtitles.english: This song as well, I'm gonna have Vestia to come take over my...

subtitles.original: ...my body, this is my body, and sing for me.
subtitles.english: ...my body, this is my body, and sing for me.

subtitles.original: Is that okay?
subtitles.english: Is that okay?

subtitles.original: So we're gonna welcome Vestia here, okay?
subtitles.english: So we're gonna welcome Vestia here, okay?

subtitles.original: Zeta!
subtitles.english: Zeta!

subtitles.original: Where are you?
subtitles.english: Where are you?

subtitles.original: Zeta!
subtitles.english: Zeta!

subtitles.original: Love Song / Mosawo
subtitles.english: Love Song / Mosawo

subtitles.original: 候補に書き出す
subtitles.english: I start writing down candidates

subtitles.original: 感情任せの思いを綴って
subtitles.english: Writing down thoughts left to my emotions

subtitles.original: 繰り返し消してみては
subtitles.english: I try erasing them over and over

subtitles.original: ありがちな台詞ばかり
subtitles.english: But they're all just cliché lines

subtitles.original: あなた以外は
subtitles.english: Other than you

subtitles.original: いらないなんて
subtitles.english: Something like not needing anything

subtitles.original: 簡単な恋や愛だけじゃまだ
subtitles.english: Simple love or affection still can't...

subtitles.original: 語りきれないよ
subtitles.english: ...fully express it all

subtitles.original: 愛しいだけじゃ足りないよ
subtitles.english: Just being beloved isn't enough

subtitles.original: 歌に乗せて送りたい
subtitles.english: I want to send my feelings in a song

subtitles.original: 息継ぎすら忘れるほどあなたを紡ぐ
subtitles.english: Spinning words for you so much I even forget to breathe

subtitles.original: 止まらない胸の騒ぎは
subtitles.english: This unstoppable unrest in my chest

subtitles.original: 朝を追い越したってでも
subtitles.english: Even if it overtakes the morning, still...

subtitles.original: でもああまだ
subtitles.english: Still, ah, not yet

subtitles.original: 声に出せないのラブソング
subtitles.english: It's a love song I can't put into words

subtitles.original: いつか吐息混じりの「愛してる」を
subtitles.english: Someday, a sigh-filled "I love you"
